uk.ac.bradford.dungeongame

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.bradford.dungeongame.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The Entity class stores basic state information for both the Player and Monster entity types in the game. The type of entity is stored as an EntityType, an enumeration type local to this class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Entity.EntityType
      EntityType is an enumeration type with two possible values, representing either a Monster or the Player in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Entity(int maxHealth, int x, int y, Entity.EntityType type)
      This constructor is used to create an Entity object to use in the game for both the player and monsters

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeHealth(int change)
      Changes the current health value for this Entity, setting the health to maxHealth if the change would cause the health attribute to exceed maxHealth
      int getHealth()
      Returns the current health value for this Entity
      int getMaxHealth()
      Returns the maxHealth value for this Entity
      Entity.EntityType getType()
      Returns the type of this Entity, either EntityType.PLAYER or EntityType.MONSTER
      int getX()
      This method returns the current X position for this entity in the game
      int getY()
      This method returns the current Y position for this entity in the game
      void setPosition(int x, int y)
      Sets the position of the Entity in the game

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(int maxHealth,
              int x,
              int y,
              Entity.EntityType type)
        This constructor is used to create an Entity object to use in the game for both the player and monsters
        Parameters:
        maxHealth - the maximum health of this Entity, also used to set its starting health value
        x - the X position of this Entity in the game
        y - the Y position of this Entity in the game
        type - They type of Entity, either EntityType.PLAYER or EntityType.MONSTER

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        public int getX()
        This method returns the current X position for this entity in the game
        Returns:
        The X co-ordinate of this Entity in the game

      • getY

        public int getY()
        This method returns the current Y position for this entity in the game
        Returns:
        The Y co-ordinate of this Entity in the game

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
                        int y)
        Sets the position of the Entity in the game
        Parameters:
        x - The new X position for this Entity
        y - The new Y position for this Entity

      • changeHealth

        public void changeHealth(int change)
        Changes the current health value for this Entity, setting the health to maxHealth if the change would cause the health attribute to exceed maxHealth
        Parameters:
        change - An integer representing the change in health for this Entity. Passing a positive value will increase the health, passing a negative value will decrease the health.

      • getHealth

        public int getHealth()
        Returns the current health value for this Entity
        Returns:
        the value of the health attribute for this Entity

      • getMaxHealth

        public int getMaxHealth()
        Returns the maxHealth value for this Entity
        Returns:
        the value of the maxHealth attribute for this Entity

      • getType

        public Entity.EntityType getType()
        Returns the type of this Entity, either EntityType.PLAYER or EntityType.MONSTER
        Returns:
        the EntityType of this entity
